import React,{useState} from 'react' import classes from './CourseViewDashboard.module.css'; import {BsFillCheckSquareFill} from 'react-icons/bs'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {BsFillTrashFill, BsPeopleFill} from 'react-icons/bs'; import {BiEdit} from 'react-icons/bi'; import {RiSendPlaneFill} from 'react-icons/ri'; const CourseViewDashboard = (props)=>{ let history = useHistory(); const [style,setStyle]=useState(props.Course); const moveToSubject=()=>{ history.push('/dashboard/subject'); } const enrollHandler =()=>{ } return (
{/*
SUBJECT: {style.courseName}
CODE: CLM 221 (342101) */}
SUBJECT: {props.Course.subject}
CODE: {props.Course.courseLocalCode} ({props.Course.courseGlobalCode})
DESIGNED FOR: {props.Course.designedFor}
INSTRUCTOR: Prof. Seema Bahinipati
{/* 37 */} {/**/}
UPCOMING CLASS: 9:45 am | 27/02/2022
STATUS: Ongoing
View Detail
); } export default CourseViewDashboard;
